mapper.select: SELECT idx as bwno, name , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(book_date, '%m/%d'), ' ', SUBSTR('일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(book_date), 1)) as bookDate FROM book_wait WHERE DATE_FORMAT(book_date, '%Y/%m/%d') = #{date} LIMIT #{pageNo}, 4

SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(bw.book_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as date, (select count(*) from book_wait bws WHERE DATE_FORMAT(bws.book_date, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(bw.book_date, '%Y%m%d') ) as count FROM book_wait bw WHERE book_date > date_add(now(), interval - 7 day) ORDER BY date_format(bw.book_date, '%Y%m%d')

select CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(con_date, '%m/%d'), ' ', SUBSTR('일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(con_date), 1)) as date, morning, afternoon, extra from book_wait_list where book_wait_idx = #{bwno} order by con_date limit #{pageNo}, 4
